      • draw

        void draw​(Game game)
        Draw the game at a given instant.

      • getRuntimeInterval

        int getRuntimeInterval​()
        Get the time in milliseconds it should take each round to occur.
        Returns:
        the time in milliseconds it should take each round to occur.

      • getGametimeInterval

        int getGametimeInterval​()
        Get the time in milliseconds each time step should record. for example, at 30fps this should return 1/30 seconds.
        Returns:
        the time in milliseconds each time step should record.
